mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.collectName, c.bathroomId, c.prjid projectId, c.sncode, c.areaId, c.status, c.version, c.isSoftDelete, b.bathroomName FROM tbathroomcollectdev c INNER JOIN tbathroom b ON b.bathroomId = c.bathroomId WHERE c.prjid = #{projectId} and c.sncode = #{sncode} and c.isSoftDelete != 1 LIMIT 1
